rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious foyer that integrates Vastu principles with a welcoming Art Deco design. Includes built-in storage and decorative elements.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A luxurious living area featuring geometric patterns and intricate detailing reminiscent of Art Deco. Vastu compliant orientation for social gatherings.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A dedicated dining space with elegant fixtures and ample natural light, aligned with Vastu guidelines for food consumption.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped modern kitchen designed to blend Art Deco aesthetics with functionality. Adheres to Vastu principles for cooking spaces.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom featuring classic Art Deco motifs and modern amenities. Oriented according to Vastu for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest bedroom with integrated storage and decor in the Art Deco style. Vastu compliant layout for tranquility.

rooms.name: Study
rooms.description: A quiet study area designed for work and reflection, incorporating Art Deco details with Vastu principles ensuring a conducive environment.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-appointed bathroom with modern fixtures and elegant finishes. Vastu guidelines followed for plumbing and water flow.

location.description: A grand entry door styled in Art Deco, ensuring a welcoming yet secure access point.
Access to the central courtyard featuring decorative balustrades and integrated landscaping elements.
A large window with Art Deco trims providing natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with high ceilings and elegant Art Deco detailing. Vastu oriented for restful energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom

central_courtyard.description: An open central courtyard designed as a relaxing focal point with landscaping elements that enhance Vastu energy flow. Features decorative Art Deco accents and space for family gatherings.
